title: ðŸš¨ Detroit Lions hire Dan Campbell - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/20)
description:
Dan Campbell is your new head coach of the Detroit Lions. That means Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech are here to gather for an emergency reaction podcast. First, the guys break down who Dan Campbell is and share his playing and coaching background. Then they evaluate the hire and if it's a big enough "splash" for the organization. What will Campbell's immediate and long-term expectations be? What is the future for Matthew Stafford in Detroit? Those answers and more on this ðŸš¨episode.
ï»¿'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â
